go_data.justification: Crd1 is involved in cardiolipin production as shown by complementation of cardiolipin production in CRD1 knockout yeast.
Although not explicitly stated, cardiolipin synthase (Crd1) is typically associated with the mitochondrion, however since it is not explicitly stated in the text, this term should not be included.
The subcellular localization of ScCrd1-cMyc in T. brucei was analyzed by immunofluorescence microscopy and showed that the tagged protein is properly targeted to the mitochondrion.
p20 competes with eIF4G for binding to eIF4E, inhibiting cap-dependent translation initiation.
p20 competes with eIF4G for binding to eIF4E.
